rows.label: tlk70000015_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Before the chairman came, every
shop in this area was doing
business in its own way.

rows.label: tlk70000015_03_msg0002
rows.name:
It certainly didn't do much to
foster a sense of community, and
it didn't help sales, either.

rows.label: tlk70000015_03_msg0003
rows.name:
To put it simply, what we needed
was someone who could breathe life
into the whole shopping ward.

rows.label: tlk70000015_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Then Chairman Morumo showed up with
all the energy of a marching band
and everything changed overnight!

rows.label: tlk70000015_03_msg0005
rows.name:
Young people came in and opened new
shops. It's finally started to feel
like we're a real community!
